text:
Kinnek, an NYC start up is hiring python developers and a senior front end developer.

Backend: Python, Django, MySQL stack Front end: Angular or other frame works (ideally 7+ years of experience)

Kinnek is an online marketplace for small business purchases. We are bringing the entire procurement process online! Post Series B startup with a 12 person dev team and 45 total employees

If interested contact: nathalie@kinnek.com
